title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore         Fredericksburg Battlefield bookstore NPS Photo    Can't read enough Civil War? When you visit the park, be sure to check out our bookstore units at several park sites. Each bookstore offers books, brochures, postcards, apparel, and driving tour CDs tailored to each site. All proceeds from these sales support National Park Service sites. The main bookstore units are located in a building adjacent to the Fredericksburg Battlefield Visitor Center and in the Chancellorsville Visitor Center with smaller outlets in the Stonewall Jackson Shrine and Chatham Manor. Contact the Fredericksburg Battlefield bookstore or the Chancellorsville Battlefield bookstore by calling the park at 540-693-3200.  Find select items online at the Eastern National online bookstore: eparks.com
